name: typescript-injections
description: TypeScript Injections is a dependency injection library, which move responsibility from producer to customer.

scripts.test: (shx mkdir .temp && shx cp -r src .temp/src && shx cp -r tests .temp/tests && mocha -r esm -r ts-node/register src '.temp/src/**/*.spec.ts' 'tests/**/*.spec.ts' && shx rm -rf .temp) || shx rm -rf .temp
scripts.build: npm run build-commonjs && npm run build-es6
scripts.build-commonjs: (shx rm -rf build/commonjs/* && tsc --project tsconfig-commonjs.json) || shx rm -rf build/commonjs/*
scripts.build-es6: (shx rm -rf build/es6/* && tsc --project tsconfig-es6.json) || shx rm -rf build/es6/*
scripts.main: npm run test && npm run build

author: Sebastian Wojdyga
